titles.secondary: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 9 BONUS - more from the finalists and Ed Gamble!
titles.entity_title: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 9 BONUS - more from the finalists and Ed Gamble!

synopses.short: Sounds exclusive extra as Ed Gamble chats more to all the finalists.
synopses.medium: Sounds exclusive extra as Ed Gamble chats more to all the finalists in their first exclusive interviews.
synopses.long:
Sounds exclusive as Ed Gamble chats further to all the finalists from the first UK Celebrity Traitors, with additional contributions from Jonathan Ross, Tameka Empson, Mark Bonnar, Ruth Codd, Clare Balding, and Paloma Faith.

If you want one final dose of chat from the Players, this is the episode for you. But be warned... it contains spoilers for Episode 9 of The Celebrity Traitors.

The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.

You can watch Uncloaked on iPlayer here: https://bbc.in/48ilW3e

titles.secondary: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 9 featuring all the finalists and Claudia Winkleman!
titles.entity_title: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 9 featuring all the finalists and Claudia Winkleman!

synopses.short: The finalists join Ed for their exclusive first interviews. Claudia Winkleman joins.
synopses.medium: All the finalists join Ed Gamble for their exclusive first interviews in front of a live studio audience. Claudia Winkleman also joins to reflect on the first UK Celebrity series.
synopses.long:
All the finalists join Ed Gamble for their exclusive first interviews, fresh from that staggering final episode. They discuss the nailbiting endgame, and reflect on their full castle experiences. With additional contributions from Jonathan Ross, Celia Imrie, Clare Balding, Ruth Codd, Kate Garraway, Niko Omilana, and Mark Bonnar.

Claudia Winkleman also joins Ed to digest the first UK Celebrity series, and give her thoughts on this year’s players.

This final dissection, recorded in front of a studio audience, is packed with spoilers for Episode 9 of The Celebrity Traitors – you have been warned!

The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.

titles.secondary: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 1 with Ed Gamble and guests!
titles.entity_title: Celebrity Traitors Series 1: Episode 1 with Ed Gamble and guests!

synopses.short: Ed Gamble unpacks episode one of The Celebrity Traitors
synopses.medium: Ed Gamble and guests unpack all the drama from The Celebrity Traitors episode one.
synopses.long:
Ed Gamble is back for the official Traitors companion podcast - The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked! In each and every episode, Ed will catch up with the murdered and banished players to get the scoop on all the backstabbing and treachery that goes on inside the castle. Plus, he will be joined by players from series past who will give their reactions and expert analysis on the game.

The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.

titles.secondary: Traitors Series 3 Episode 12: THE FINAL – with Claudia Winkleman and all our finalists
titles.entity_title: Traitors Series 3 Episode 12: THE FINAL – with Claudia Winkleman and all our finalists

synopses.short: Claudia Winkleman and all Series 3 finalists join Ed to unpack this year’s game.
synopses.medium: Claudia Winkleman and all our Series 3 finalists join Ed to unpack this year’s dramatic endgame.
synopses.long:
All Series 3 finalists join Ed for their first ever interviews, fresh from that blockbuster final episode. They reveal all about the endgame, and their full castle experience.

Claudia Winkleman also joins Ed to reflect on Series 3, and give her thoughts on this year’s players.

This is it: the big final dissection of that dramatic climax, recorded in front of a studio audience, and packed with spoilers for Episode 12 of The Traitors Series 3 – you have been warned!

The Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.

synopses.long:
Ed Gamble hosts the official visualised podcast for the ultimate game of trust and treachery.

titles.secondary: Traitors Series 3: Episode 11 with Rose Matafeo, Wilf, Diane, Harry and Players!
titles.entity_title: Traitors Series 3: Episode 11 with Rose Matafeo, Wilf, Diane, Harry and Players!

synopses.short: The latest murdered and banished Players join Ed Gamble and guests for exclusive insights.
synopses.medium: Ed Gamble reacts to the penultimate episode of the series with the latest murdered and banished Players from series 3 – plus Rose Matafeo, Wilf from S1, and Diane and Harry from S2
synopses.long:
The latest murdered and banished Players join Comedian Rose Matafeo, Wilf from Series 1 and Diane and Harry from Series 2 to react to the penultimate episode of the series. 

They’ll be talking tactics, twists, betrayals and who has it in them to win: The Traitors or The Faithful.

This podcast contains spoilers for Episode 11 of The Traitors Series 3.

The Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.

synopses.medium: Ed Gamble chats to the latest murdered and banished Players from series 3 – plus Jaz from Series 2, Oti Mabuse, and Katherine Ryan
synopses.long:
The latest murdered and banished Players chat to Ed Gamble, Oti Mabuse, Katherine Ryan and Jaz from Series 2. Plus – listen as they find out who the Traitors are for the very first time, exclusively on Uncloaked.

This is the place for your need-to-know Traitors intel, all the latest gameplay analysis and exclusive player interviews.

synopses.short: Sounds exclusive extra episode with Comedian Chris McCausland and S1 Traitor, Amanda
synopses.medium: Ed Gamble is joined by comedian Chris McCausland and S1 Traitor Amanda, and the latest murdered and banished Players from Episode 8 for exclusive insights!
synopses.long:
Sounds exclusive extra episode of Series 3 Episode 8 with host Ed Gamble, comedian Chris McCausland and S1 Traitor Amanda. The latest murdered and banished Players also join Ed and guests for a game of ‘Reversed Ruminations’...good luck! 
  
This podcast contains spoilers for Episode 8 of The Traitors Series 3. 
  
The Traitors: Uncloaked is a Listen production.
